snippet: Fishermen in Morro Bay, Calif., have joined forces with scientists and civic leaders to give small-scale fishermen a chance against big-time operators.
abstract: Fishermen, scientists and civic leaders join forces to set up the Morro Bay Community Quota Fund in effort to give small-scale fishermen a chance against big-time operators; quota is amount of a particular species of fish that can be caught in a geographical area, and quota rights can be expensive; fund makes it more affordable by leasing rights to individual fishermen; money will be used for further research into sustainable fishing practices.
lead_paragraph: Fishermen in Morro Bay, Calif., have joined forces with scientists and civic leaders to give small-scale fishermen a chance against big-time operators.

headline.main: Creating a Safe Harbor for a Village Heritage
headline.print_headline: Creating a Safe Harbor for a Village Heritage
